title: Excellent New Furni For Fresh Hotel
text: I made some new furniture for fresh hotel, i hope it can be implemented into the hotel. Image: https://imgur.com/a/LZR6G I've made a background with 3 different states, and duplicates of them (one for left wall and one for right wall). I'm not sure how to make an SQL i'm going to need a template, and i don't know what to put for some of the info below. And i got that info from a 2011 tutorial so some of it might not be the same. Furniture ID: Furniture Name: Mountain Background Furniture Type: i Furniture Description: Created by QuantumPancakes. Sprite ID: Data ID: Interaction Type: Interaction Count: Sittable: 0 Vending ID: 0 Catalogue Page ID: Not sure. Cost (Coins): 1 Cost (Pixels): 0 Amount: 1 Let me know if you can help me fix this up ^. [MENTION=2]Kane[/MENTION] [MENTION=79]Chels[/MENTION] [MENTION=7428]Gucci[/MENTION] [MENTION=2335]Ronnie[/MENTION]
